Title: Sarantis Greece
List: The parent of the Group established in 1964.
Activities include production, distribution and exports.
A well recognized portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries, Luxury Cosmetics, Home Care products and Health & Care products.
Strong Exports Activity in approximately 20 countries
A modern Production plant, including a fully equipped R&D department, and 4 warehouses supporting its supply chain in Greece and abroad.
More than 850 employees
Established a JV with The Estee Lauder Companies, that distributes Estee Lauder products in Greece, Romania, Bulgaria and Cyprus.

Title: Ergopack - Ukraine
List: Established in 1996 and acquired by Sarantis Group in 2018.
A Household products producer of Garbage Bags, Food Packaging and Cleaning items.
Activities include production, distribution and exports.
The brand portfolio includes flagships of Home Care products and Cosmetics & Toiletries category.
Strong Exports Activity in CIS and European countries.
A modern Production plant and 2 warehouses supporting its supply chain.
More than 750 employees.

Title: Sarantis Poland
List: Established in 2000.
Activities include production, distribution and exports.
A strong portfolio of great own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries, Luxury Cosmetics and Home Care products.
A modern Production plant and a warehouse supporting its supply chain in Poland and abroad.
Approximately 250 employees.
Acquisition of LUKSJA brand in 2020 reinforced the Polish brand portfolio.

Address.Town: Șos. Bucharest-Ploiești no. 172-176, building B, 2nd floor, space B2, sector 1,

Title: Sarantis Romania
List: Established in 1996.
Distributing a well diversified brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries, Luxury Cosmetics, Home Care products and Health & Care brands.
The acquisition of ELMIPLANT in 2007 reinforced the company’s position in the cosmetics market.
1 warehouse
More than 200 employees.

Title: Sarantis Skopje
List: Established in 1997.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
1 warehouse
Approximately 40 employees

Title: Sarantis Slovakia
List: Established as a subsidiary in 2018 following the acquisition of INDULONA Cosmetics brand.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
1 warehouse.

Title: Polipak
List: Established in 1986 and acquired by the Group in December of 2015.
A producer of plastic packaging and wrappings -plastic films extrusion of LDPE, HDPE, MDPE (polyethylene) and their blends.
Production includes PL products and products for industry use.
Strong Exports Activity in CEE and European countries.
A technologically advanced production plant including a warehouse support its strong position in the market.
More than 300 employees.

Title: Ergopack- Russia
List: Established in 2018.
Distributing own Home Care brands in the Russian market.
1 warehouse supporting its sales network.

Title: Sarantis Banja Luka
List: Established in 2011.
Distributing a well diversified brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
1 warehouse.

Title: Sarantis Belgrade
List: Established in 1997.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
The acquisition of TOPSTAR in 2011 strengthened the company’s position in the market.
Export activity in neighboring countries.

Title: Sarantis Bulgaria
List: The first subsidiary of the Group, established in 1994.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries, Luxury Cosmetics and Home Care products.
1 warehouse.
Approximately 95 employees.

Title: Sarantis Czech Republic
List: Established in 2002.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
The acquisition of ASTRID in 2014 and INDULONA in 2018 reinforced the Company’s position in the Cosmetics market.
1 warehouse

Title: Sarantis Hungary
List: Established in 2006.
Distributing a well recognized brand portfolio of own and distributed brands in the categories of Cosmetics & Toiletries and Home Care products.
The acquisition of TRADE 90 in 2008 and DOMET in 2011 supported the Company’s position in the household products market.
1 warehouse

Title: Sarantis Portugal
List: Established in 2013.
